#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
typedef unsigned int ui;
int main() {
    ui n,m,a,b,k,sum=0;
    cin>>n>>m;
    while(m--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b>>k;
        sum += ((b-a) + 1)*k; 
    }    
    cout<<(int)(sum/n)<<endl;
    
    return 0;
}
